Dm_GE_0018_Text_009_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hey! The floor started to rise, then
slammed back down!
Dm_GE_0018_Text_003_b:
This platform connects to the very top
of this temple.
Dm_GE_0018_Text_004_b:
Use your power to charge the four
batteries, and it will function once more.
Dm_GE_0018_Text_006_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>I heard the voice very clearly just now.
It's calling to me...
Dm_GE_0018_Text_007_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It said that I should use my power to
charge the four batteries...
Dm_GE_0018_Text_008_b:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>The monster we fought outside earlier fled
to the top of this temple...

And the voice that has been speaking to
us said the platform should be able to
take us all the way up there.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If that's true, we could corner the monster
at the top. We might also figure out who
is talking to us, and why...
